name: Voice-Based AI Booking Agent
description: Built a real-time voice-based AI agent for automated cab booking. Used speech-to-text and LLMs for intent detection and slot extraction, reducing booking handling time by 30–35% and achieving <5% human call-transfer rate during live testing while maintaining >90% booking success rate across varied user inputs.
shortDescription: Real-time voice-based AI agent for automated cab booking
highlights: Built a real-time voice-based AI agent for automated cab booking.
Used speech-to-text and LLMs for intent detection and slot extraction.
Reduced booking handling time by 30–35%.
Achieved <5% human call-transfer rate during live testing.
Maintained >90% booking success rate across varied user inputs.

name: Autonomous Recruitment Agent System
description: Developed an AI-driven system for resume matching and candidate screening. Used semantic embeddings and LLM reasoning for shortlisting decisions, improving shortlisting relevance by 35–40% over keyword-based filtering and reducing recruiter effort by ~50% and screening time by ~45%. Designed structured interview flows with consistent scoring logic.
shortDescription: AI-driven resume matching and candidate screening with embeddings + LLM reasoning
highlights: Developed an AI-driven system for resume matching and candidate screening.
Used semantic embeddings and LLM reasoning for shortlisting decisions.
Improved shortlisting relevance by 35–40% over keyword-based filtering.
Automated early-stage screening workflows.
Reduced recruiter effort by ~50% and screening time by ~45%.
Designed structured interview flows with consistent scoring logic

name: Qlik & Power BI Dashboard Suite
description: Modernized legacy insurance analytics by rebuilding KPI dashboards across Qlik Sense, QlikView, Tableau, and Power BI. Automated scheduled refreshes, blended SQL extracts, and Python ETL jobs to deliver leadership-ready fatality claim and growth reporting.
shortDescription: Unified BI dashboards with automated KPI refresh for insurance analytics
highlights: Reverse-engineered Excel heavy dashboards into modular BI datasets with governed measures and role-level security.
Built parameterised visuals for claims severity, turnaround times, and policy growth so executives could slice KPIs in real time.
Coordinated cross-tool release train keeping Power BI, Tableau, Qlik Sense, and QlikView assets in sync each sprint.

metrics.refreshCadence: 4 BI stacks refreshed automatically every 60 minutes
metrics.stakeholderCoverage: 120+ leadership users onboarded across business units
metrics.manualReportingDrop: Eliminated 18 legacy Excel workbooks from monthly reporting

name: Fatality Claims Forecasting & Automation
description: Automated fatality-claim forecasting by blending SQL extracts, Python ETL, and Power BI scenario planning. Surfaced anomaly detection, processing-time KPIs, and forecasting dashboards that reduced manual reporting by 60%.
shortDescription: Predictive analytics stack for claim trends and processing KPIs
highlights: Built PyCaret forecasting jobs that surface 12-week claim inflow projections directly inside Power BI.
Set up anomaly detection and SLA breach alerts, piping notifications into Teams and email workflows.
Packaged actuarial-ready extracts so finance teams could ingest the same curated dataset for what-if analysis.

metrics.alerting: 24/7 SLA breach notifications rolled out to operations

name: Real Estate Price Prediction
description: Machine learning project focused on predicting real estate prices using advanced regression techniques. Features comprehensive EDA, data cleaning, and interactive visualizations.
shortDescription: ML-based real estate price prediction with interactive visualizations
highlights: Curated 70+ engineered features covering locality scores, amenity counts, and floor insights before model training.
Compared linear, tree-based, and boosting regressors with consistent cross-validation to choose a production model.
Shipped interactive Plotly dashboards so stakeholders can slice predictions by budget, area, and property class.

html.title: Interactive price segmentation dashboard
html.description: Plotly visualization exported for standalone viewing.

html.title: Exploratory analysis notebook
html.description: Static HTML export of the exploratory Jupyter notebook.

dashboards.title: Tableau Interactive Dashboard
dashboards.description: Embedded Tableau Public visualization summarizing property insights.

documents.title: Real Estate Project Report
documents.description: Detailed methodology, feature engineering, and findings for the project.

name: Real-Time Chess Helper using YOLOv8
description: Built a robust real-time chessboard state recognition system using YOLOv8, capable of detecting and classifying chess pieces from live camera feeds at over 30 FPS. Achieved 98.7% mAP@50 IoU on diverse chessboard configurations using advanced training techniques and a curated Kaggle dataset. Enabled automated gameplay analysis and integration with chess engines for move prediction and AR learning tools.
shortDescription: AI-powered chess analysis and training tool
highlights: Annotated 4k+ board states and augmented synthetic angles to boost robustness under dim lighting.
Optimized YOLOv8 model with TensorRT so the move detector holds 30 FPS on consumer GPUs.
Integrated Stockfish suggestions and AR overlays, enabling coaching tips after every predicted move.

name: Gender, Nationality & Emotion Detection
description: Deep learning system that simultaneously detects gender, nationality, and emotion from facial images using convolutional neural networks (CNN). Achieved 98%+ accuracy in multi-class detection.
shortDescription: CNN-based facial analysis system with 98%+ accuracy
highlights: Engineered multi-head CNN that performs attribute, nationality, and emotion prediction in a single pass.
Implemented OpenCV preprocessing pipeline to normalise lighting and align facial landmarks automatically.
Delivered responsive web demo so users can test live camera feeds with privacy-safe caching.

metrics.deployment: Runs at 22 FPS on CPU-only laptops

name: LinkedIn Feed Sentiment Analysis
description: Natural Language Processing system that analyzes sentiment and engagement patterns in LinkedIn posts using advanced NLP techniques. Automated web scraping and sentiment analysis of LinkedIn posts, delivering 95%+ accuracy in content classification.
highlights: Developed Puppeteer-based scraper that collects posts, reactions, and comments while respecting LinkedIn rate limits.
Fine-tuned BERT classifier with class-weighting to handle imbalanced engagement labels.
Visualised sentiment trends and virality factors so marketing teams can plan content calendars.

metrics.automation: Daily incremental refresh with headless jobs

name: Planto.ai VS Code Copilot
description: Developed a Planto.ai-branded VS Code extension delivering context-aware AI assistance, screenshot-to-UI generation, and schema-aligned code scaffolding. Led UX, TypeScript architecture, and LLM integration to support 16+ programming languages for distributed teams.
shortDescription: AI-assisted VS Code workspace with visual-to-code automation
highlights: Shipped design system and theming engine that keeps VS Code panels brand-aligned without impacting performance.
Implemented screenshot-to-UI workflow that turns PNG mocks into React components through structured prompts.
Created workspace memory and prompt caching so engineers receive context-aware suggestions across sessions.

metrics.latency: Sub-2s suggestion latency with local caching
